transport.question: I have wheels and you can sit inside, I help you go places, what am I?
I travel on tracks and carry many people. Toot toot!
I float on water and can take you across the sea.

hints.text: 🌊 I am larger than a raft.
🚢 I can transport many people or cargo.

transport.question: I fly in the sky and take people to far away places.

hints.text: ☁️ I am faster than a car.

transport.question: I have two wheels and you pedal to make me go.

hints.text: 🔔 I sometimes have a bell to ring.
🛣️ I can travel on bike paths.

transport.question: I travel on water but go under the sea.

hints.text: 🔦 I need lights in the deep.
🌊 I am sealed and protects you from the water.

transport.question: I can fly straight up and down and have spinning blades on top.

hints.text: 🚁 I can land in small places.
🚨 I am used for rescue missions sometimes.
⬆️ I don't need a runway to take off.

transport.question: I'm a vehicle that can carry lots of people but I am longer than a car. I stop often.
I launch into space. I am very fast!

hints.text: 🌌 I am the only way to get to other planets.

transport.question: I travel on rails, but unlike trains, I usually run through the middle of a city.

hints.text: 🏘️ I have routes that are primarily in urban areas.
⚡ I'm often powered by electricity from above.
🛑 I stop often, and share the road with cars and pedestrians.

bug.question: I have six legs and love to march. I carry food back to my queen in a giant arch. What am I?

hints.text: 💪 I am very strong for my size.

bug.question: I flutter by with colorful wings. I start as a caterpillar, it's a beautiful thing. What am I?

hints.text: 🐛 I love to eat leaves when I'm young.

bug.question: I make honey and buzz around. My sting can hurt, but I help plants all around. What am I?

hints.text: 🐝 I am important for making honey!

bug.question: I jump very high and like to eat plants. My legs are long, and I hop. What am I?

hints.text: 🐸 Some animals like to eat me.

bug.question: I have spots on my back, red and black. Gardeners like me; I eat aphids. What am I?

hints.text: 🐞 I am considered lucky by some people.

bug.question: I light up the night with a gentle glow. I'm a bug that shines. What am I?

hints.text: 💡 I use bioluminescence to attract a mate.
🌌 You can often see me during summer evenings.

bug.question: I spin a web and catch my prey. I have eight legs. What am I?

hints.text: Fly away fly, you might get caught!

bug.question: I am a master of disguise, blending in with leaves and trees. I look like a twig. What am I?

hints.text: 🍃 My camouflage helps me avoid predators.
🌳 I am a type of insect.
🔎 Look closely or you might miss me!

bug.question: I visit flowers to drink sweet nectar. I'm often mistaken for a bee but I'm an imposter. What am I?

hints.text: 🎭 I am good at imitating others!
🪰 I am a type of fly.
🐝 I am pretending to be something else!

bug.question: I make a buzzing sound that annoys people. I like to bite and drink blood. What am I?

hints.text: 🖐 I like to bite exposed skin.
